item.title: Shameless Self-Promotion
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I'll be presenting the "Easy Multithreading with Visual FoxPro" session I did at Southwest Fox 2011 at the Atlanta FoxPro Users Group on June 21, 2012.

The post Shameless Self-Promotion appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: Speaking at DAFUG and DevCon
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ll be at the Detroit Area Fox Users Group meeting this Thursday night (February 8), talking about the Desktop Alerts. I’ve never been to Michigan, so I’m looking forward to the trip and meeting some new friends. I jokingly told the guys at the Chicago meeting last December that Chicago was the first stop on my 2007 ‘World Tour’ (I […]

item.title: Heading to the Windy City
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ll be presenting the Desktop Alerts session at the Chicago FoxPro User’s and Developers Group meeting on Tuesday, December 12, at 5:30PM (CST). I’m looking forward to the trip and meeting the fine folks in the Windy City. I’ve never been to Chicago (or Illinois, for that matter). I wonder if it’ll be cold up there? This […]
